meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeff Gorham Margaret Metcalf Anthony Fox Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6068.

td.p: Jeff Gorham, an accountant from Richmond, Virginia
Margaret Metcalf, a research librarian from Washington, D.C.
Anthony Fox, an account executive from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 4-day cash winnings total $51,998)

tr.td: BASIC SCIENCE
CELEBRITIES' MIDDLE NAMES
A NATION OF VODKA BRANDS
EVERYDAY HEROES
BOTH MY X's
(Alex: Each correct response will contain two "X"s.)
LIVE IN TEXAS

JeffWhat is the leatherback turtle?
$2,801
MargaretWhat is a leatherneck turtle?
$1,400
the leatherback turtle')
